metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18255 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The perf_cpu_time_max_percent_handler function in kernel/events/core.c inthe Linux kernel before 4.11 allows local users to cause a denial ofservice (integer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact via alarge value, as demonstrated by an incorrect sample-rate calculation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.13.0-16.19

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
